full_text: @ForTheCOLTure_J Jason love pod been following you since the hilarious Chuck Pagano videos !!! My question is who makes a bigger impact ngakoue or Gilmore thanks!!! Hope all is well glad to hear your feeling better GO Colts

@ForTheCOLTure_J What is the ceiling and floor for this team?
